# Materials

> **来源**: <https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/materials-in-unreal-editor-for-fortnite>
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-26T22:54:55.823186

---

Creating your own [materials](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/unreal-editor-for-fortnite-glossary#material) and [textures](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/unreal-editor-for-fortnite-glossary#texture) in **Unreal Editor for Fortnite (UEFN)** gives the [meshes](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/unreal-editor-for-fortnite-glossary#mesh) you use on your island a unique look and feel.

Explore the pages on material properties to see tutorials on how to create or customize materials and textures, the most used material nodes, and more.

[![Material Nodes and Settings](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/804accd0-6c3a-4453-a848-b532dfb3f020?resizing_type=fit&width=640&height=640)

Material Nodes and Settings

Learn how material nodes work and how to set them in a material instance.](<https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/material-nodes-and-settings-in-unreal-editor-for-fortnite)[![UI> Materials](<https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/304d7754-f0bb-4d72-b009-e6f6c5f32dc6?resizing_type=fit&width=640&height=640>)

UI Materials

Learn to create a number of different dynamic materials that can be used with UMG.](<https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/ui-materials-in-unreal-editor-for-fortnite)[![Material> Library](<https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/d814fbe8-513e-4836-8a59-4beac502ec28?resizing_type=fit&width=640&height=640>)

Material Library

Use the material library to create custom looks for everything from grass to architecture.](<https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/material-library-in-unreal-editor-for-fortnite)[![Two-sided> Materials](<https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/ae482488-b263-4055-8a28-bb54e1301f59?resizing_type=fit&width=640&height=640>)

Two-sided Materials

Learn how to create a two-sided material to create a hollow effect on your mesh.](<https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/create-twosided-materials-in-unreal-editor-for-fortnite)[![Material> Effects](<https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/5dafd989-388d-4f71-b429-7eb89ac125d8?resizing_type=fit&width=640&height=640>)

Material Effects

Learn about different effects for materials in UEFN.](<https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/material-effects-in-unreal-editor-for-fortnite>)
